content.question: Which of the following best explains the United States Department of Stateâ€™s interest in the Berlin industrial fair?

choices.label: Economic rivalry between the United States and Western European states
Wilsonian idealism favoring democratic states in Eastern Europe
Ideological competition with the Soviet Union
Concern that economic instability was undermining democratic states in Western Europe

content.answer: Ideological competition with the Soviet Union

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
